page.title: 19LIFE STYLES
page.content: Mobility plays a large part in people's lives. Communications in the form of TV, radio and telephone make a great deal of difference to contact with the outside world. The pace of life is generally fast with health affected by this in both positive and negative ways.Home Life for the majority centres around the television set, then within essential village halls and pubs; with churches in third place. Most people have hair and other beauty treatments done professionally. Since the advent of London Overspill, vandalism and theft have led to greater insecurity; people being less willing to leave cash out for tradesmen. The unemployed young tend to congregate in apathetic groups for security; tinker with cars and motor cycles; go rabbiting and smoke and drink.
